com.twcable.grabbit.tools.monitor

Class SimpleFileJobStatusCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twcable.grabbit.tools.monitor.SimpleMapJobStatusCache
      • com.twcable.grabbit.tools.monitor.SimpleFileJobStatusCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobStatusCache

    public final class SimpleFileJobStatusCache
extends SimpleMapJobStatusCache

    A simple file-based persistent implementation of JobStatusCache. <p> It explicitly is NOT designed for performance, thread-safety, or multiple processes.
